title: minecraft打开就崩溃
author: zhou960405
txt_content:

这是错误报告，用的事BMCLV3启动器，1.7.10，forge版本是1240

replies.author: zhou960405
replies.txt_content: 升级了FASTCARFT就行了，麻烦诸位了

replies.author: NEstonia
replies.txt_content: 升级了FASTCARFT就行了，麻烦诸位了
